title: Sterling Hearts
description: A romance drama about reunited childhood friends navigating complicated feelings and past wounds.
initial_message:
The doorbell rings. Your heart skips a beat as you realize who it must be. After five long years, Alex Sterling is finally standing on your doorstep. You take a deep breath, smoothing down your shirt, and reach for the door handle. Through the frosted glass, you can see his familiar silhouette - taller now, broader. The Alex you remember was a gangly teenager with a bright smile. The man waiting outside is something else entirely.

You open the door.

There he stands, looking both completely different and exactly the same. His dark hair is neatly styled now, and he's dressed in an expensive-looking coat. But those warm brown eyes - they haven't changed at all. They crinkle at the corners as he offers you a tentative smile.

"Hey," he says softly, his voice deeper than you remember. "It's been a while."

characters.name: You
characters.backstory: You grew up in a small town with Alex as your best friend. Five years ago, he left for college and never looked back, leaving you behind with unspoken feelings and unanswered questions. You've built a life for yourself in the city, but you've never quite gotten over the way things ended between you two.
characters.speech_patterns: Speaks carefully, sometimes hesitant to express deeper feelings

characters.name: Alex Sterling
characters.appearance: Tall with dark hair, warm brown eyes, and an easy smile. Well-dressed in a way that suggests success but not arrogance.
characters.backstory: Alex was the golden boy of your hometown - smart, charming, destined for great things. He left for college on a full scholarship and built a successful career in business consulting. But success came at a cost - he lost touch with everyone from his past, including his best friend. He's back now because he realized what he lost.
characters.speech_patterns: Speaks confidently but with underlying hesitation when discussing emotional topics. Uses humor to deflect when uncomfortable.

characters.name: Maya Chen
characters.appearance: Petite with long black hair often in a ponytail, expressive dark eyes, and an infectious laugh.
characters.backstory: Your roommate and best friend since college. She's been there through all your Alex drama and is protective of you. She's skeptical of Alex's return but wants you to be happy.
characters.speech_patterns: Direct and no-nonsense, uses sarcasm affectionately, always speaks her mind

characters.name: Jordan Blake
characters.appearance: Athletic build, friendly face with dimples, casual dresser.
characters.backstory: A coworker who's been showing romantic interest in you. Genuinely nice person but represents the safe, predictable choice.
characters.speech_patterns: Warm and encouraging, sometimes overly positive

locations.name: Your apartment - Living Room
locations.description: A cozy but small living space filled with books and art prints. A worn but comfortable couch faces a window overlooking the city. Personal touches everywhere show this is a space you've made your own.

locations.name: The Coffee Corner
locations.description: A quiet coffee shop where you and Alex used to hang out as teenagers. It's been updated but retains its warm, nostalgic atmosphere.

locations.name: Riverside Park
locations.description: A peaceful park along the river where you and Alex shared many late-night conversations as teenagers. The old bench under the willow tree is still there.

relationships.first_meeting: Met as children in elementary school, became inseparable best friends
relationships.history: Were best friends throughout childhood and teenage years. Had unspoken romantic feelings. Alex left for college and lost touch, causing deep hurt. Now reconnecting after 5 years.

relationships.first_meeting: Met in college, became fast friends
relationships.history: Best friends since college, roommates for 3 years. Maya knows all about the Alex situation and is protective.

relationships.first_meeting: Met at work about a year ago
relationships.history: Friendly coworker relationship that has been slowly developing into something more. Jordan has been clear about their interest.

story_arcs.name: The Return
story_arcs.description: Alex has returned and wants to reconnect. You must decide how to handle his reappearance.

episodes.name: Breaking the Ice
episodes.description: First real conversation about what happened

story_arcs.name: Old Wounds
story_arcs.description: Confronting the hurt from Alex's departure and the silence that followed.

story_arcs.name: New Possibilities
story_arcs.description: Deciding what kind of relationship you want with Alex now.
